This resource pack replaces 4 of the mob heads with miniature blocks for your builds!
The pack replaces the textures of the creeper, skeleton, wither skeleton and zombie heads with the textures of 4 blocks.
View of them from the back

View of them from the front
The pack replaces skeleton skulls with command block, creeper heads with an observer, zombie head with slime block, and wither skeleton skull with nether reactor core.

CUSTOM LANTERNS
The lanterns you always see everyday will be change to a better and detailed version. the model of the lanterns is changed to cross texture or rows, to make it look square and circle. the normal brighter lantern and the soul lantern will be even beautiful.
This resource pack will change the look of the lanterns, it will be taller and different from the original one.
Lanterns are all detailed and may look like asian lanterns like paper lanterns.

You must apply the resource pack to your world
please don not apply in global resource, it may may have problems
you can pick more designs by adjusting
the subpack

title: Clean Vanilla RTX (Windows 10 Only)
briefDescription: Clean Vanilla RTX is a simple texture pack for 1.16 Minecraft Windows 10. It strives to be as close to vanilla while still looking amazing and clean. ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Clean Vanilla RTX is a simple texture pack for 1.16 Minecraft Windows 10. It strives to be as close to vanilla while still looking amazing and clean. You can use this pack in any world across Minecraft Bedrock, as long as you are in the correct beta / RTX version. This pack also works on servers both featured and not featured. To install simply download the CleanVanillaRTX.mcpack file, and open it. This pack is a fork of RTX Vanilla Conversion by u/TheCivilHulk. His original pack is here: https://github.com/TheCivilHulk/Minecraft-RTX-Vanilla-Conversion-and-Patches. If you have any questions my discord is YERT20082#0001.

title: Dododonut?s Halloween Fun Pack (Survival-Friendly)
briefDescription: Trick or Treat! Who?s at the door? It's a Pumpcreeper, a Vampig, and a Boo! Even the Iron Golem?s feeling festive! This pack ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Trick or Treat! Who?s at the door? It?s a Pumpcreeper, a Vampig, and a Boo! Even the Iron Golem?s feeling festive! This pack takes the vanilla textures and adds a distinctly festive fun. Fall colors, costume-wearing mobs, candy, and more create an exciting Halloween feel that can be enjoyed in pure vanilla survival ? perfect for your realm or server!
To kick things off, let?s talk leaves! The grass and foliage are changing color! Isn?t it lovely!
Next up, everybody?s favorite: CANDY. Yes, it looks good, but no, you can?t eat it. (It?s really just crushed up flowers)
Blood, blood, BLOOD! You can now use redstone to decorate a ketchup factory! (Yes it looks like it doesn?t connect corners, but that?s just visual and there?s nothing I can do about that)
Look at all the mobs! Don?t let them take your candy from you!
Don?t worry! You can dress up too! Just make sure you take along a ghostly totem of undying ? who knows what could be out there!
Ooooooo? spoooooooky?.. The moon is red and it?s raining? tomato soup?
There are now even some spoooooky paintings to decorate your haunted mansion with.
Last but not least, we now have an atmospheric menu screen to greet you. Happy Halloween!

title: Old Crying Obsidian Texture Pack
briefDescription: In Minecraft Java Edition 1.16, the old crying obsidian texture was added to Programmer Art. But in Bedrock Edition, they didn't add it yet. But with ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In Minecraft Java Edition 1.16, the old crying obsidian texture was added to Programmer Art. But in Bedrock Edition, they didn?t add it yet. But with this pack, you can enjoy it!
If you prefer the old crying obsidian texture, but you?re not a Java Edition player, well, download this pack and enjoy it! This pack is completely survival friendly so don?t worry, you can apply it to your survival worlds.

title: Leaf?s Mobber Mobs
briefDescription: Leaf's Mobbier MobsMobbier mobs is a pack that 3D-ifies default mobs, including pigs, cows, bees, chickens, skeletons, and spiders, as well as gives them better ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Mobbier mobs is a pack that 3D-ifies default mobs, including pigs, cows, bees, chickens, skeletons, and spiders, as well as gives them better animations. Easy to edit, customise, and integrate into your own packs.
I made this pack because other packs either; ? don?t fully work in multiplayer; ? are too complicated to customise for your own use; ? or break when you delete one of the models (such as a spider model, if you don?t like it).
My pack fixes all these; ? It works in multiplayer; ? It has no extra unnecessary files ? Models and animations are interdependent, which means if you don?t like one of the models, you can go into the ?models? folder and delete it (and the textures in the ?texture? folder, if the has any textures); ? For animations, go into the ?animations? folder and delete the one you do not like.
Conversely, you can add your own models and animations, or integrate my models and animations into your own pack without breaking it, however, this is all theoretical and might possibly not work/break your pack (always make a backup before editing your packs).I take no responsibility for list files or anything.
I also tried making the models so they work with custom textures (as long as the model is a default model), however, this means the pack textures are of lower quality, and also your custom textures might make the mob look weird (it?ll still work though!).
Some models, such as the bee and firework, have a dedicated texture, so don?t support custom textures.
And now for the models and animations;

title: Platapus Short Swords
briefDescription: There are many "PvP Texture Packs" and other types of texture packs that use short swords in them. Here's my question. Have you ever wanted ...

crawledImageUrls.text: There are many ?PvP Texture Packs? and other types of texture packs that use short swords in them. Here?s my question. Have you ever wanted to use those swords separately? Your answer is most likely no. However, I present to you my very own short swords texture pack. This is most likely the most simple one you will find on MCPE DL. And that?s exactly what makes it so great. It has no major changes to the sword?s design besides practically chopping the end off and rebuilding it. Other short sword packs rather do all this complicated stuff that isn?t actually that complicated by sharpening the edges or completely redesigning the handles and tips and all that. This is the opposite.

title: No More Border Particle!
briefDescription: Have you always been bothered by those annoying particles of the border blocks? Then this is exactly the right thing for you. This pack makes ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you always been bothered by those annoying particles of the border blocks? Then this is exactly the right thing for you. This pack makes the border particles disappear with a simple application.
What exactly does this pack do now?
You probably know those annoying particles that are created by border blocks.
These particles are minimized with this pack so that they are invisible to you.

title: Low Fire Resource Pack
briefDescription: This Resource Pack makes the fire on you look lower and you can see better. Low fire is really useful in PvP. The default fire ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This Resource Pack makes the fire on you look lower and you can see better. Low fire is really useful in PvP. The default fire texture makes the player practically blind, making it hard to see your opponent.
